about.bio: Boris mai haɓaka yanar gizo ne wanda ke aiki a Forbes. Video Hub App shiri ne na gefe wanda aka kirkira tare da Electron da Angular. {intl_donated} na kowane siyarwar wannan software an bada gudummawar ne ga {intl_amf}, wata babbar kyauta ta {intl_givewell}.
about.creator: Mahaliccin
about.p1: Gudummawa suna zuwa ga {intl_amf} (AMF) saboda ita babbar kyauta ce ta {intl_givewell}, mai kimanta sadaka mai zaman kanta. Duk $ 2 da aka baiwa AMF na kare mutane biyu daga zazzabin cizon sauro na tsawon shekaru 3-4.
about.p2: Boris yana bayar da aƙalla 10% na kuɗin shigarsa ga ƙungiyoyi masu saukin kuɗi (duba {intl_givewell}) tun a shekarar 2011. Tallace-tallace daga wannan software ɗin zai ba da ƙarin gudummawa ga ƙaunatacciyar sadakarsa.
about.title: Game da
about.whydonate: Me ya sa ba da gudummawa?

blog.donation_text: {intl_donated} daga kowane siye zuwa {intl_amf}, wata babbar kyauta ce ta {intl_givewell}.

contact.heading: Tambayoyi? Sharhi? Neman fasali? Rahoton bug?
contact.reason: Da fatan za a zaɓi dalilin da ya sa za a miƙa hannu:
contact.title: Saduwa

download.after_text: Za a kai ku zuwa shafin saukarwarku kamar yadda za a yi imel da hanyar haɗi don saukarwa. Aƙalla shekara guda daga farkon sayanka zaka sami damar zazzage sabon sigar software a kowane lokaci. Idan ka rasa hanyar haɗi, tuntuɓi ni kawai.
download.limited: Iyakance ga bidiyo 50 a kowace cibiya
download.paying_text: Duk intanet ɗin ana sarrafa shi ta hanyar intl_stripe} ko kuma {intl_paypal} tare da aikin biya na {intl_chec}.
download.title: Zazzagewa
download.whypay: Me yasa za ku biya abin da kuke so?
download.whypay_text: Ina son mutane da yawa su iya amfani da software, saboda haka farashin ya yi ƙasa da yadda ya kamata, amma kuma ina so in sanya duniya ta zama wuri mafi kyau, saboda haka {intl_donated} daga kowane siye zuwa {intl_amf}, saman -ka bayar da sadaka ta hanyar intl_givewell}. Da fatan za a yi la'akari da biyan duk yadda kuke ganin ya dace.

faq.file_support: Waɗanne nau'in fayil ne app ɗin ke tallafawa?
faq.file_support_version_3_answer: Allyari akan haka zaku iya yin Video Hub App don shigo da kowane nau'in fayil: kawai ƙara shi a cikin saitunan.
faq.heading: Tambayoyi akai-akai
faq.multifolder: Zan iya shigo da fayil sama da ɗaya a cikin cibiya ɗaya?
faq.multifolder_a1: Video Hub App 3 (wanda za'a sake shi a ƙarshen 2020) zai baka damar yin hakan a sauƙaƙe.
faq.multifolder_a2: Video Hub App 2 zai samar da cibiya daga dukkan manyan fayilolin da suke cikin babban fayil da ka zaba. Babu wata hanyar da za a fadawa Video Hub App 2 don shigowa daga sama da tushen tushe (farawa).
faq.multifolder_a3: Akwai mafita guda biyu masu yiwuwa:
faq.multifolder_a4: Createirƙiri cibiyoyi da yawa, kuma zaku iya canzawa tsakanin su tare da dannawa 1 (kawai kunna cikin saitunan don nuna cibiyoyin kwanan nan) a cikin labarun gefe na hagu.
faq.multifolder_a5: Createirƙira alama don duk manyan fayilolin da kuke so a cikin babban fayil ɗin, kuma ƙirƙirar cibiya daga wannan babban fayil ɗin.
faq.multifolder_version_3_answer: Je zuwa saituna, danna 'Hub na yanzu', danna 'Shirya manyan fayiloli' don ƙara ƙarin manyan fayiloli.
faq.q1: Ta yaya zan ƙirƙiri sabon cibiya?
faq.q1_answer: Danna kan gear (saman dama) don samun damar 'menu na saituna'. Danna maɓallin farko don fara mayen 'mayen'.
faq.q2: Zan iya samun cibiya sama da ɗaya?
faq.q2_answer: Kuna iya samun ɗakunan yawa (tarin) kamar yadda kuke so. Wataƙila kuna son Abubuwan Bidiyo na Gida, Fina-Finan, da Ayyukan Gwaji a cikin daban, tarin daban. Kawai ƙirƙirar cibiyoyi uku! Kuna iya canzawa tsakanin su ko dai ta danna fayil ɗin sau biyu, jawo fayil ɗin a cikin aikace-aikacen, ko danna sunan hub a cikin jerin tarihin kwanan nan a cikin aikace-aikacen.
faq.q3: Menene ya faru da fayilolin bidiyo na?
faq.q3_answer: Duk bidiyon ku basu canza ba. Video Hub App yana ɗaukar hotunan kariyar bidiyo kawai don zaku iya samfoti su a kowane lokaci. Idan bidiyon suna kan rumbun kwamfutar waje zaka iya ganin su a cikin Video Hub App ko rumbun kwamfutar yana haɗuwa ko a'a. Amma danna bidiyon zai buɗe shi kawai a cikin na'urar kunna bidiyo idan an haɗa rumbun kwamfutar ta waje.
faq.q4: Menene ya faru lokacin da bidiyo na suka canza?
faq.q4_answer: Idan ka kara, goge, ko sake suna duk wani bidiyo, kawai danna 'Rescan directory' da Video Hub App zasu sabunta abubuwan cikin su don dacewa da canje-canjen ka. Har sai kun 'Rescan kundin adireshi', duk tsofaffin bidiyon zasu nuna a cikin Video Hub App, amma danna kan bidiyon da kuka goge ko kuka sake suna ba zai sake kunna bidiyo ba. Sake shirya kundin adireshi yana da sauri, kuma daga baya Video Hub App zai nuna sabunta ra'ayi game da bidiyon ku.
faq.q5: Zan iya tsara bidiyo ta kwanan wata?
faq.q5_answer: Da fatan za a je saituna, danna maballin 'Saitunan Bincike', gungura zuwa 'Yanayin zaɓuɓɓuka a cikin jerin zaɓuka', sannan danna 'Kwanan Kwancen da aka Gyara' don ba da damar zaɓin jeri.
faq.q6_answer: Kuna iya jawowa & sauke hoto daga compter din ku akan kowane bidiyo, kuma za'a maye gurbin tsoho hoton. Hakanan, zaku iya zaɓar ɗayan ɗayan sauran hotunan kariyar da aka fitar don zama sikirin aiki na asali ta hanyar buɗe takardar / cikakken bayanin bidiyo (danna dama -> cikakkun bayanai, ko danna saman kusurwar dama-dama na hoto a cikin Hoton Hotuna) da danna kusurwar dama-dama (tauraruwa) na kowane hoto.
faq.q7_answer: Kuna iya kunna maɓallin 'Kunna duka' a cikin saituna. Lokacin da ka danna shi, duk bidiyon da ke nuna yanzu a cikin gidan yanar gizon ka za a buɗe a matsayin jerin waƙoƙi tare da duk shirin da kwamfutarka ke amfani da shi don buɗe fayilolin '.pls'. Kawai sanya ɗan bidiyon ku tsoho don buɗe fayilolin '.pls'.
faq.q8_answer: Duba shafin 'gajerun hanyoyi' a cikin menu na saituna don cikakken jerin gajeren hanyoyin gajerun hanyoyi.
faq.start_a1: Sanya sunan tarin ku (cibiya), misali 'Bidiyo Na'.
faq.start_a2: Danna 'Zaɓi kundin adireshin bidiyo', babban fayil ɗin kwamfutarka inda bidiyo ɗinku suke.
faq.start_a3: Danna 'Canza hub directory', babban fayil dinda kake son samun Video Hub App ya adana duk bayanan game da wannan cibiya.
faq.start_a4: Zaɓi girman hotunan kariyar da kuke son Video Hub App don cirewa
faq.start_a6: Bari mu ce kun sanya wa cibiyar ku suna 'My Videos'. Video Hub App zai cire hotunan kariyar kwamfuta daga duk bidiyon da ka zaba sannan ka sanya shi a cikin wani jaka mai taken 'vha-My Videos' a cikin kundin adireshin da ka zaba.
faq.start_a7: Allyari, Video Hub App zai adana fayil 'My Videos.vha2' a cikin babban fayil ɗin. Yanzu duk lokacin da ka danna 'My Videos.vha2', matattararka zata buɗe nan take, koda kuwa bidiyon suna kan rumbun waje.
faq.title: Tambayoyi akai-akai | Tambayoyi

general.description: Binciko, bincika, kuma tsara bidiyon ku
general.title: Video Hub App

givewell.q1: Mayar da hankali kan shirin tare da kyakkyawar shaidar tasiri da tsadar rayuwa.
givewell.q2: Tsari don tabbatar da cewa gidajen sauro sun isa ga wadanda suka karba da kuma lura ko sun kasance a cikin gidaje kuma cikin kyakkyawan yanayi na dogon lokaci.
givewell.q3: Daki don karin kudade - mun yi imanin AMF za ta iya amfani da ƙarin kuɗi don isar da ƙarin raga.
givewell.q4: Nuna gaskiya - AMF ta ba da babban bayani game da aikinta tare da mu kuma muna iya bi da kuma fahimtar aikinta a hankali.

home.every_os: Yana aiki iri ɗaya ba komai komai OS ɗin da kuke amfani da shi
home.feature1_text: Tsayar da kan hoto don ganin hotunan kariyar kwamfuta
home.feature2_text: Filin fim yana nuna hotunan kariyar kwamfuta daga kowane bidiyo
home.feature3_text: Duk hotunan kariyar allo daga kowane bidiyo lokaci ɗaya
home.feature4_text: Ara kowane haɗin zaɓin bincike don nemo abin da kuke so
home.feature5_text: Sake suna, ƙara alama, taurari, da bayanin kowane bidiyo
home.like_youtube: Yi tunani kamar YouTube don bidiyo akan kwamfutarka
home.step1_text: daga kwamfutarka, rumbun kwamfutarka na waje, ko cibiyar sadarwar komputa
home.step2_text: lamba da girman hotunan kariyar kwamfuta da shirye-shiryen bidiyo
home.step3_text: fara yin bincike ko da yayin da aka samar da hotunan kariyar kwamfuta
home.tagline: Binciko, bincika, kuma tsara bidiyon ku

share.heading: Idan kana son manhajar
share.thankyoutext: Inganta manhaja wata ƙwarewa ce ta kanta kuma kamfanoni suna kashe kuɗi da yawa akan sa. Ni mai kirkirar guda ne kuma zanyi matukar godiya idan kuka raba kalmar game da app dina
